Key Match Events: Steph Curry scored 16 of his 24 points in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry was able to start against the Wizards, although he played only 24:05
Post-Match Reflections: Golden State used 13 players, twelve of them played between 13:06 and 28:53
The Warriors have shown off their depth, Curry’s return gives them a true star to lean on
Miscellaneous Highlights: Golden State has averaged an edge of 24 points per game in bench points so far this season
Steve Kerr coached his 800th game, becoming the 18th coach to reach that milestone with only one team
Others: Washington was competitive despite shooting just 23% from 3-point range
Kyshawn George had 20 points, he was 6 of 17 from beyond the arc
